Text: The subtitles are a joke. At least the english ones. Probably done with google translate. They are unreadable.
And yes, you need subs. Spoken language is NOT English, but French.

OK, English speakers.  Go to subscenes.com.  Don't search for 22 Bullets, search for the French title, L'Immortel.  There you will find a well done subtitle file for this great rip.

Hope this helps, and many thanks to the uploader.
